shri lanka nidahas pakshaya ada mema abhagyasampanna iranamata muhuna di sitinne thamanta chandaya nodun laksha 58ka janathawa atharata gos nayakathwaya laba ganimata obathuma katayuthu kirima nisa bawa mage wishwasaya we. 2015 janadhipathiwaranaye di shri lanka nidahas pakshaya pramukha eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayata chandaya prakasha kala siyaludena adatath thamange nayakaya washayen piliganu labanne mahinda rajapaksha mahatha bawa kisiwakutath rahasak nowe.

me wadihiti niwasaye siti eka piyaku kiwe thaman me gewanu labanne 103wana janma dinaya bawaya .daruwan ha biriya nosalaka siyalu depala liyagena parata watunu bawa da kiyayi.mehidi thawath piyeku kiwe thamange daruwa adhikaranayaka ihalama thanathurak darana bawaya.itha amaruwen uganwa pasuwa thamanwa amathaka kara athi bawada kiya sitiyeya.thawath piyeku kiwe thamangen daruwanta nisi wagakima itu nowima nisa daruwan langata yannata tharam sudusu nathi nisa mehi pamini sitina bawayi.kese wethath hithin duk gindaraka dawemin maranaya paminena thek manga bala sitina me piyawarun bana pothakin duka niwa ganna aakaraya dakagatha hakiwini.loka piyawarunge dinaya samarana mewan dinayaka ho thamanwa jathaka kala piya wenuwen obe wagakima itu kala da kiya sitha balamu.
